auto_abilities_data.name: sensor
auto_abilities_data.effect: Shows enemy HP, elemental resistances, active statuses, and a brief description, while the user is in the active party.

auto_abilities_data.name: piercing
auto_abilities_data.description: Deal normal damage to armored enemies.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Attacks and skills ignore enemy's Armored status.

auto_abilities_data.name: first strike
auto_abilities_data.description: Act first at beginning of battle.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Guarantees the first turn during battle, even in an ambush. Monsters with this auto-ability get their turn before the player characters.

auto_abilities_data.name: initiative
auto_abilities_data.description: Raises party's chances for a preemptive strike.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Raises party's chances for a preemptive strike and eliminates ambushes, except against enemys with a 100% ambush rate.

auto_abilities_data.name: firestrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Adds fire element to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to be fire-elemental.

auto_abilities_data.name: lightningstrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Adds lightning element to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to be lightning-elemental.

auto_abilities_data.name: waterstrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Adds water element to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to be water-elemental.

auto_abilities_data.name: icestrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Adds ice element to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to be ice-elemental.

auto_abilities_data.name: darktouch
auto_abilities_data.description: Sometimes adds darkness to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 50% base chance to inflict Darkness for three turns. Chance stacks additively with Darkstrike.

auto_abilities_data.name: darkstrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Almost always adds darkness to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 100% base chance to inflict Darkness for three turns. Chance stacks additively with Darktouch.

auto_abilities_data.name: silencetouch
auto_abilities_data.description: Sometimes adds silence to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 50% base chance to inflict Silence for three turns. Chance stacks additively with Silencestrike.

auto_abilities_data.name: silencestrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Almost always adds silence to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 100% base chance to inflict Silence for three turns. Chance stacks additively with Silencetouch.

auto_abilities_data.name: sleeptouch
auto_abilities_data.description: Sometimes adds sleep to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 50% base chance to inflict Sleep for three turns. Chance stacks additively with Sleepstrike.

auto_abilities_data.name: sleepstrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Almost always adds sleep to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 100% base chance to inflict Sleep for three turns. Chance stacks additively with Sleeptouch.

auto_abilities_data.name: poisontouch
auto_abilities_data.description: Sometimes adds poison to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 50% base chance to inflict Poison. Chance stacks additively with Poisonstrike.

auto_abilities_data.name: poisonstrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Almost always adds poison to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 100% base chance to inflict Poison. Chance stacks additively with Poisontouch.

auto_abilities_data.name: stonetouch
auto_abilities_data.description: Sometimes adds petrification to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 50% base chance to inflict Petrification. Chance stacks additively with Stonestrike.

auto_abilities_data.name: stonestrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Almost always adds petrification to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 100% base chance to inflict Petrification. Chance stacks additively with Stonetouch.

auto_abilities_data.name: deathtouch
auto_abilities_data.description: Sometimes adds death to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 50% base chance of instantly KO'ing the target. Chance stacks additively with Deathstrike. Doesn't work on zombies.

auto_abilities_data.name: deathstrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Almost always adds death to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 100% base chance of instantly KO'ing the target. Chance stacks additively with Deathtouch. Doesn't work on zombies.

auto_abilities_data.name: zombietouch
auto_abilities_data.description: Sometimes adds zombie to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 50% base chance to inflict Zombie. Chance stacks additively with Zombiestrike.

auto_abilities_data.name: zombiestrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Almost always adds zombie to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 100% base chance to inflict Zombie. Chance stacks additively with Zombietouch.

auto_abilities_data.name: slowtouch
auto_abilities_data.description: Sometimes adds slow to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 50% base chance to inflict Slow. Chance stacks additively with Slowstrike.

auto_abilities_data.name: slowstrike
auto_abilities_data.description: Almost always adds darkness to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to have a 100% base chance to inflict Slow. Chance stacks additively with Slowtouch.

auto_abilities_data.name: distill power
auto_abilities_data.description: Adds Power Distiller effect to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to force the enemy hit to drop Power Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

auto_abilities_data.name: distill mana
auto_abilities_data.description: Adds Mana Distiller effect to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to force the enemy hit to drop Mana Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

auto_abilities_data.name: distill speed
auto_abilities_data.description: Adds Speed Distiller effect to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to force the enemy hit to drop Speed Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

auto_abilities_data.name: distill ability
auto_abilities_data.description: Adds Ability Distiller effect to attacks and skills.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's attacks and skills to force the enemy hit to drop Ability Spheres. The number of dropped Spheres is equal to the number of items the enemy would have dropped normally.

auto_abilities_data.name: strength +3%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's physical attacks to deal 3% more damage. Stacks additively with other 'Strength +x%' Abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: strength +5%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's physical attacks to deal 5% more damage. Stacks additively with other 'Strength +x%' Abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: strength +10%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's physical attacks to deal 10% more damage. Stacks additively with other 'Strength +x%' Abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: strength +20%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's physical attacks to deal 20% more damage. Stacks additively with other 'Strength +x%' Abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: magic +3%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's magical attacks to deal 3% more damage. Stacks additively with other 'Magic +x%' Abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: magic +5%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's magical attacks to deal 5% more damage. Stacks additively with other 'Magic +x%' Abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: magic +10%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's magical attacks to deal 10% more damage. Stacks additively with other 'Magic +x%' Abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: magic +20%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user's magical attacks to deal 20% more damage. Stacks additively with other 'Magic +x%' Abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: counterattack
auto_abilities_data.description: Strike back after being physically attacked.
auto_abilities_data.effect: User targets attacker with a counter attack if targeted via a physical attack. Does not trigger against attacks hitting more than one target, nor against attacks that ignore Protect.

auto_abilities_data.name: evade & counter
auto_abilities_data.description: Evade physical attack and strike back.
auto_abilities_data.effect: If targeted via a physical attack, the user evades the attack, if possible, and then targets attacker with a counter attack. Does not trigger against attacks hitting more than one target, nor against attacks that ignore Protect.

auto_abilities_data.name: magic counter
auto_abilities_data.description: Strike back after being attacked with magic.
auto_abilities_data.effect: User targets attacker with a counter attack if targeted via a magical attack. Does not trigger against attacks hitting more than one target, nor against attacks that ignore Shell.

auto_abilities_data.name: magic booster
auto_abilities_data.description: Use more MP to heighten spell power.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Increases the damage and healing of Black and White Magic abilities by 50%, but doubles their MP cost. The MP cost increase stacks multiplicatively with 'Half MP Cost' and 'One MP Cost'.

auto_abilities_data.name: alchemy
auto_abilities_data.description: Doubles the potency of recovery items.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Recovery items will heal double the normal HP. Does not affect Mix abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: half mp cost
auto_abilities_data.description: Reduces MP cost of spells by half.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Reduces the MP cost of all abilities by half. Stacks multiplicatively with Magic Booster.

auto_abilities_data.name: one mp cost
auto_abilities_data.description: Reduces MP cost of spells to 1.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Sets the MP cost of all abilities to 1. Stacks multiplicatively with Magic Booster.

auto_abilities_data.name: double ap
auto_abilities_data.description: Doubles the amount of AP earned.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Doubles the amount of AP the user receives when in the active party at the time the respective enemy is defeated.

auto_abilities_data.name: triple ap
auto_abilities_data.description: Triples the amount of AP earned.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Triples the amount of AP the user receives when in the active party at the time the respective enemy is defeated.

auto_abilities_data.name: overdrive -> ap
auto_abilities_data.description: Earn more AP instead of charging Overdrive gauge.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Converts all Overdrive gauge points obtained by the user to AP while the auto-ability is equipped.

auto_abilities_data.name: sos overdrive
auto_abilities_data.description: Charges Overdrive at double speed when HP is low.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Doubles the Overdrive charge speed if the user is in HP critical. Doesn't stack with 'Double Overdrive' or 'Triple Overdrive', but does stack with Mix abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: double overdrive
auto_abilities_data.effect: Doubles the Overdrive charge speed. Doesn't stack with 'SOS Overdrive' or 'Triple Overdrive', but does stack with Mix abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: triple overdrive
auto_abilities_data.effect: Triples the Overdrive charge speed. Doesn't stack with 'SOS Overdrive' or 'Double Overdrive', but does stack with Mix abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: gillionaire
auto_abilities_data.effect: Doubles the amount of Gil earned from battles, if the user is in the active party at the end of the battle.

auto_abilities_data.name: break damage limit
auto_abilities_data.effect: Sets the maximum amount of damage and recovery the user can deal to 99,999. This does not affect items or most Mixes.

auto_abilities_data.name: capture
auto_abilities_data.effect: Attacks and Skills will capture certain monsters as long as it is the killing blow.

auto_abilities_data.name: no ap
auto_abilities_data.effect: The user receives zero AP. Has no effect if the user does not equip the ability at the time the enemy is defeated.
Hidden auto-ability used by Aeons. Grants immunity to all status ailments except Curse and Eject.

auto_abilities_data.name: fire ward
auto_abilities_data.effect: Reduces fire-elemental damage by half.

auto_abilities_data.name: fireproof
auto_abilities_data.effect: Fire-elemental attacks deal zero damage to the user.

auto_abilities_data.name: fire eater
auto_abilities_data.effect: Fire-elemental attacks directed towards the user are absorbed.

auto_abilities_data.name: sos nulblaze
auto_abilities_data.description: Casts NulBlaze when HP is low.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Grants the user unremovable NulBlaze status while in HP Critical.

auto_abilities_data.name: defense +3%
auto_abilities_data.description: Reduces damage from physical attacks by 3%.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Reduces the user's damage taken from physical attacks by 3%. Stacks additively with other 'Defense +x%' abilities.

auto_abilities_data.description: Reduces damage from physical attacks by 5%.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Reduces the user's damage taken from physical attacks by 5%. Stacks additively with other 'Defense +x%' abilities.

auto_abilities_data.effect: Reduces the user's damage taken from magical attacks by 20%. Stacks additively with other 'Defense +x%' abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: hp +5%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Raises the users's max HP by 5%. Stacks additively with other 'HP +x%' abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: hp +10%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Raises the users's max HP by 10%. Stacks additively with other 'HP +x%' abilities.

auto_abilities_data.effect: Raises the users's max HP by 20%. Stacks additively with other 'HP +x%' abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: mp +10%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Raises the users's max MP by 10%. Stacks additively with other 'MP +x%' abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: mp +20%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Raises the users's max MP by 20%. Stacks additively with other 'MP +x%' abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: mp +30%
auto_abilities_data.effect: Raises the users's max MP by 30%. Stacks additively with other 'MP +x%' abilities.

auto_abilities_data.name: auto-potion
auto_abilities_data.description: Automatically use items to recover HP when damaged.
auto_abilities_data.effect: If the user is in HP Critical after an attack, they will use either a Potion, Hi-Potion, or X-Potion in this priority order, if the item is in your inventory.

auto_abilities_data.name: auto-med
auto_abilities_data.description: Automatically use items to cure status ailments.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Causes the user to automatically use an item to remove status ailments that are inflicted on them. If multiple ailments are inflicted at once, or if the item for the ailment in question is not available, a Remedy will be used; otherwise, the status recovery item for that particular status will be used. Does not function if the user is inflicted with a status that incapacitates them or makes them uncontrollable.

auto_abilities_data.name: auto-phoenix
auto_abilities_data.description: Automatically use Phoenix Down on KO'd user.
auto_abilities_data.effect: If an ally in the active party is KO'd, the user will use a Phoenix Down on the KO'd user. This can trigger multiple times from the same attack if more than one user is KO'd, but the user cannot revive themselves this way.

auto_abilities_data.name: pickpocket
auto_abilities_data.description: Improves odds of stealing rare items.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Raises the user's chance of stealing the rare item from 25% to 50%.

auto_abilities_data.name: master thief
auto_abilities_data.effect: The user always steals the rare item.

auto_abilities_data.name: hp stroll
auto_abilities_data.effect: The user's HP gradually increases while walking in the field.

auto_abilities_data.name: mp stroll
auto_abilities_data.effect: The user's MP gradually increases while walking in the field.

auto_abilities_data.name: no encounters
auto_abilities_data.effect: Random enemy encounters are prevented, if an armor with this ability is equipped. Cannot prevent fixed encounters, such as bosses and scripted fights.

auto_abilities_data.name: break mp limit
auto_abilities_data.effect: Allows the user's max MP to break the cap of 999, up to a maximum of 9,999.

auto_abilities_data.name: break hp limit
auto_abilities_data.effect: Allows the user's max HP to break the cap of 9,999, up to a maximum of 99,999.

auto_abilities_data.name: ribbon
auto_abilities_data.description: Almost completely protects against all status ailments.
auto_abilities_data.effect: Grants the user immunity to all status ailments except Death, Power Break, Magic Break, Armor Break, Mental Break, Curse, Delay, and Eject.
